reviews.author: Verified Customer
reviews.text: Great local place for coffee and food. Pleasant owners and tasty coffee. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Local Visitor
reviews.text: Quality, warm, fresh flavors and smiling employees. The staff is gracious and the service is excellent.

reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: Excellent coffee, tasty pastries, and fast — and free — wifi. Perfect spot for working or relaxing!

highlights: Perfect homemade coffee in a family-run café
Reasonable prices - drinks cheaper than many other places
